body_html:
The bazel command you are writing does not really do anything.
Please follow the guide here to build pip package from sources:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources

And please use stackoverflow with help on how to use bazel.

body:
The bazel command you are writing does not really do anything.
Please follow the guide here to build pip package from sources:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources

And please use stackoverflow with help on how to use bazel.
